definition: to show concern and care for
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: What if Love and Compassion Win?
sentences.chinese: 如果关爱和同情获胜会怎样？

sentences.english: I think it's a meaningful holiday just to benice to people and to remember people.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个有意义的节日，人们相互关爱，相互缅怀。

sentences.english: Your body will respond to the physical warmth and care, Neff says.
sentences.chinese: 你的身体会对外在的温暖和关爱做出反应。

sentences.english: Lies the that with the sun's love, in the spring becomes the rose.
sentences.chinese: 种著阳光关爱的种子，在春季会长成这朵玫瑰。

sentences.english: Now it suggests care, leisure, individuality and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 现在这词却象征着关爱，写意，独创以及美。

sentences.english: One eof the most representative is he fang town with cosette, mother and daughter of love.
sentences.chinese: 其中最具代表性的就是他对芳町与珂赛特母女的关爱。

sentences.english: As well as the love from Freudenberg.
We should love animals and care about others.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该爱护动物并关爱他人。

sentences.english: He said the Haitian people had been deeply touched “by this movement of solidarity and compassion.”
sentences.chinese: 他说，海地人民被这种支持与关爱所深深感动。

sentences.english: Thanks to the care and love, Ruslan has been gradually emerging from the shadow.
sentences.chinese: 在人们的关爱下，他现在已逐渐走出恐怖的阴影。

sentences.english: Food safety strictly control and care of life responsibility rushan.
sentences.chinese: 食品安全从严把关，关爱生命责任如山。

sentences.english: Caring Science is the ethos that underpins all we do at WALTHAM.
sentences.chinese: 关爱式科学研究是支撑威豪中心所有工作的基础。
关爱别人是一件很难的工作。

sentences.english: I love everybody with the same love.
sentences.chinese: 我对所有人都同样关爱。

sentences.english: To foster those flowers, caring is a need.
sentences.chinese: 为了培植那些鲜花，关爱和照顾是必不可少的。

to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve

warm
paternal love
to be grateful
maternal love
to accompany
"left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
to love dearly
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
in every possible way (idiom); meticulous
the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
